table.title: Character Encodings
table.cell: Windows code page 1252,a superset of ISO 8859-1
Mac Roman encoding,i.e.,the default Macintosh character set
EBCDIC code page 1047 as used on IBM AS/400 and S/390 systems
Original encoding used by non-text (symbol) or non-Latin text fonts
Macroman on the Mac,ebcdic on EBCDIC-based systems,and winansi on all other

slide.blurb: The pdflib.upr file entries for this would look like this:
slide.example:
FontAFM LuciduxSans=lcdxsr.afm Utopia-Regular=UTRG____.afm URWGothicL-BookObli=a010033l.afm URWPalladioL-Roma=p052003l.afm NimbusMonL-ReguObli=n022023l.afm
FontOutline LuciduxSans=lcdxsr.pfa Utopia-Regular=UTRG____.pfa URWGothicL-BookObli=a010033l.pfa URWPalladioL-Roma=p052003l.pfa NimbusMonL-ReguObli=n022023l.pfa CANDY=CANDY.ttf Arial=arial.ttf
